text.text_translated:
Cultural stereotypes are wrong ideas about a whole group.  
We should be aware of possible differences.  
This awareness can help us avoid miscommunication.  
But stereotypes are bad for business relationships.  
Our region, community, age, gender, work culture and experiences shape us.  
We should keep this knowledge in mind.  
We should not think all people in a country are the same.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Cultural stereotypes are wrong ideas about groups of people.  
People can think and act differently.  
Knowing this can help us avoid miscommunication.  
But we must also remember that stereotypes can hurt business relationships.  
Many things can change how we think.  
We live in a place. This place can change us.  
We meet people. These people can change us.  
Our age can change us.  
We can be a man or a woman. This can change us.  
We belong to a work culture. This culture can change us.  
We have life experiences. These experiences can change us.  
We should keep this knowledge in the back of our mind.  
We should not call all people in a country the same.
